'''''Stolen''''' is a [[stealth-based game]] where the player assumes the role of Terri Ransom, an [[acrobat]]ic [[thief]]. Her mission is to [[infiltrate]] a number of locations and [[steal]] items therein without being caught by guards. She is assisted by Calvin, who communicates with her through her mind.
+
'''''Stolen''''' is a [[stealth-based game]] where the player assumes the role of Anya Romanov, an [[acrobat]]ic [[thief]]. Her mission is to [[infiltrate]] a number of locations and [[steal]] items therein without being caught by guards. She is assisted by Louie, who communicates with her through an [[earpiece]].
Anya has several hi-tech [[gadget]]s to assist her, including [[night vision goggles]], [[lockpick]]s, and a [[dart gun]]. Notably, Anya has no [[lethal]] arms; she cannot kill any of the guards she encounters, only knock them [[unconscious]] for a brief time.
Anya has several hi-tech [[gadget]]s to assist her, including [[night vision goggles]], [[lockpick]]s, and a [[dart gun]]. Notably, Anya has no [[lethal]] arms; she cannot kill any of the guards she encounters, only knock them [[unconscious]] for a brief time.
